Windlord::

Windlord heard Dark One's menssage and the battle in his spark 
started again... He wished a lot destroy that bot (Dark One)... If 
only he... But why???? Why did he feel belong to Maximals??? Why was 
he so worried about their??? He was neutral!!!!! He wasn't a 
maximal... He didn't belong them... Why was he so interested to save 
them??? WHY?

Windlord landed, he felt confuse and worried. Who would he save? His 
friends... Maximals... Who?

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor growled as she recieved Dark One's transmission, 
could she 
> even believe what she was hearing?
> Choradate was one of Klusters crew, and from what she knew, had the 
posesion 
> of the CF codes in his mind!
> If they didn't do something, then the CF could be under the 
controle of the 
> Alliance.
> Iron Raptor stood straight up and looked across the battlefield, 
finally 
> managing to spot Dark One.
> She opened her comm.*
> 
> " I understand."
> 
> * Her voice was a growl with shock mixed into it.
> This was a rather...perticular moment. If Any of the Alliance 
authority was 
> killed, or if soneone tried to kill the Oblitertron crew, then 
Chordats 
> would cease to exist.
> She couldn't let that happen.
> But how could she get Chordate back and keep him alive to?
> Iron Raptor sighed and looked over her shoulder at Scattershot.*
> 
> " Had this planned, didn't you?"
> 
> < What can I do?> she thought loud enough for Prowl to hear, but he 
was 
> probably too bust to help her.
> She was at a dead end.
> But in the back of her mind she knew that no matter what she did, 
Chordate 
> was doomed.
> Iron Raptor clenched her fints.*
> < Clever, very clever.>
> * But there was nothing she could do, and to cease their attack 
would leave 
> every Maixmal vulnerable and ready to be slaughtered.*
> < I'm sorry Chordate.>
> * Iron Raptor turned back towards Scattershot.*
> 
> " Now, where were we?"
> 
> 
>
